title: Where can we find some of the cool things done during the thunderdome event?
body:
I was looking around for some of the cool things that rioters have come up with during the thunderdome event and only find one or two things such as the recent smashbrothers video. Is there a list anywhere with some of the cool, funny, and outrageos things rioters have made during the event. 

And I don't just mean the ones that get finally published, like murderbride, or its recent bilgeified addition soon to be released, the ACTUAL murderbrider, what im looking for are some of the others that aren't released. 

related, have you ever though of making a video of the thunderdome showing some of the highlights? (that you legally can show that is)
